m_szDocSumamry: Why I'm Bullish On General Motors' Stock Despite Owning A Japanese Car Send Message Summary Several uncertainties surrounding General Motors' stock are either overblown or will be resolved within the next year or so. General Motors faces industry tailwind over the next two to three years. Management has chosen to prioritize profitability over sales which will translate into higher earnings. I own a Japanese car but started researching General Motors (NYSE: GM ) after some of the prominent value investors, including Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE: BRK.A ) (NYSE: BRK.B ), started buying the company.
